{%- macro add_header(page_num, max_pages, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) -%} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead %}
{{ letter_head if letter_head else '' }}
{% endif %} {%- endmacro -%}
{{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) if add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) else '' }}

OFFER LETTER


Date: {{doc.offer_date}}


Dear {{doc.applicant_name}}


{% set applicant_detail = frappe.get_doc("Job Applicant",doc.applicant) %} This is with reference to your application & subsequent interviews you had with us, we are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation}} in {{applicant_detail.custom_department}} department with our organization. You are advised to join us on {{frappe.format_date(doc.custom_due_date_for_offer_acceptance)}}.


The terms & conditions of your employment will be specified in your letter of appointment. On the day of your joining you are required to submit the documents mentioned in Annexure A.


You are requested to report on or before at (Date and Time). In case you fail to report on this date unless otherwise agreed in written the offer shall stand automatically withdrawn.


If on verification, at the time of appointment or at a later date it is found that you have furnished wrong information, in such cases your services with the company will be liable to termination.


We welcome you to Prompt Family and to a beginning of a long and mutually beneficial association.


With Best Wishes,


For, Prompt Equipment Pvt. Ltd.

Sign Placed

Anar Shah

Manager - HR



Annexure A

  1. Proof of Qualification
    • Marksheet from Class-X onwards
    • Marksheet for all semesters (Graduation & Post Graduation, if any)
    • Degree Certificate (If Degree Certificate is not available, Provisional Certificate / Course Completion Certificate)
  2. Proof of Address
    • One of these: Passport, Copy of Electricity Bill, Copy of DOT landline Telephone Bill
    • In case of staying on rent, Rent Agreement copy required
  3. Proof of Identity
    • Mandatory: PAN Card, Aadhar Card
    • Driving License (If available)
    • 2 Passport size photographs
  4. Proof of Work Experience (not applicable for fresher)
    • Experience / Relieving letter from previous organization(s)
    • Last 3 months pay slip from previous organization
